name: Farmer Phil and the Zombie Alien Robot Apocalypse
name_original: Farmer Phil and the Zombie Alien Robot Apocalypse
description:
Farmer Phil and the Zombie Alien Robot Apocalypse is a first-person shooter made in 3 hours. Blast red cylinders ("zombies") with your shotgun. Each enemy has 5 hp. Each shotgun shot shoots 5 pellets. Each pellet deals 1 damage. Don't die or you will be dead. And probably eaten, given the "zombies" part.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Click - Shoot

Spacebar - Jump

Right mouse button - Aim downsights
